article_title: Workforce Alliance meets with Sen. Alexander
article_text:

article_metadata.description: While attending the National Association of Workforce Boards 2016 Forum in Washington in March, representatives with the South Central Tennessee Workforce Alliance and Board visited Sen. Lamar Alexander, R-Tenn. From left, they are Keith Durham, Mayor of Lawrenceburg and Vice Chairman of the South Central TN Workforce Board; Bill Webb, Lewis County Mayor; Robby Moore, Mayor of Lobelville and Chairman of the South Central TN Workforce Board; Alexander; Jan McKeel, Executive Director of South Central TN Workforce Alliance; and Shaun Lawson, Hickman County Mayor. (Courtesy photo)
